channel.title: q-fin.TR updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: q-fin.TR updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Trading Large Orders in the Presence of Multiple High-Frequency Anticipatory Traders
item.description: arXiv:2403.08202v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We investigate a market with a normal-speed informed trader (IT) who may employ mixed strategy and multiple anticipatory high-frequency traders (HFTs) who are under different inventory pressures, in a three-period Kyle's model. The pure- and mixed-strategy equilibria are considered and the results provide recommendations for IT's randomization strategy with different numbers of HFTs. Some surprising results about investors' profits arise: the improvement of anticipatory traders' speed or a more precise prediction may harm themselves but help IT.
item.dc:creator: Ziyi Xu, Xue Cheng
